name: Sasau
description: A smaller town compared to Rattay, but still an important location with its monastery.

details.history: The monastery in Sasau plays a significant role in several quests, and the town itself offers various opportunities for exploration.
details.travel: The real-world counterpart is Sázava in the Czech Republic.
details.game_connections: Several quests related to the Church and the main storyline take place in Sasau.

name: Sasau Monastery
description: A prominent monastery within the town of Sasau.

details.history: The monastery is a key location for religious and political intrigue.
details.travel: Part of the Sázava Monastery complex in the Czech Republic.
details.game_connections: Many quests, including some main story quests, involve the monastery.

name: Silver Skalitz
description: A once prosperous mining town, now mostly abandoned after the Cuman raid.

details.history: Skalitz played a crucial role in the early game. It's where Henry's story begins and where he witnesses the tragic events that set him on his journey.
details.travel: The real-world counterpart is near Kutná Hora in the Czech Republic. You can visit the ruins of the medieval settlement.
details.game_connections: The prologue and early quests take place here. It's a key location for understanding Henry's motivations.

details.history: Vranik is a large Cuman camp that Henry infiltrates.
details.travel: This location is fictional.
details.game_connections: It is featured in the main story quests.

name: Rattay
description: A large and bustling town, a center of trade and power in Bohemia.

details.history: Rattay is a major hub in the game, where Henry interacts with many important characters and undertakes numerous quests.
details.travel: The real-world inspiration is the town of Rataje nad Sázavou in the Czech Republic.
details.game_connections: Many main story quests and side quests involve Rattay. It's a central location throughout the game.

name: Rattay Lower Castle (Pirkstein)
description: The lower castle in Rattay, also known as Pirkstein.

details.history: The castle serves as the residence of the lords of Rattay and plays a role in various quests.
details.travel: Part of the Rataje nad Sázavou castle complex.
details.game_connections: Several quests involve interactions with the castle and its inhabitants.

name: Talmberg
description: A fortified castle town, serving as a significant defensive point.

details.history: Talmberg is where Henry's family resided and plays a role in the early game's narrative.
details.travel: The real-world inspiration is likely based on several castles in the region, such as Talmberk Castle.
details.game_connections: It is featured in the prologue and the early game.

name: Uzhitz
description: A small village with a church and surrounding fields.

details.history: Uzhitz is often involved in side quests and exploration.
details.travel: The real-world inspiration is Úžice in the Czech Republic.
details.game_connections: Some side quests and activities, such as hunting, might lead you to Uzhitz.

details.history: Ledetchko is where Henry can participate in tournaments.
details.travel: The real-world inspiration is likely based on several villages in the region.
details.game_connections: The village is known for its combat arena.

name: Trosky Castle
description: A ruined castle, a prominent landmark in the landscape.

details.history: Trosky Castle is a location that can be visited and explored in the game.
details.travel: The real-world counterpart is Trosky Castle in the Czech Republic.
details.game_connections: It's a location that can be explored. It may be part of some side quests.

details.history: Troskowtz is a location that can be visited and explored in the game.
details.travel: The real-world inspiration is likely based on several villages in the region.
details.game_connections: It may be part of some side quests.

details.travel: The real-world inspiration is likely based on several rock formations in the region.
details.game_connections: It may be part of some side quests.

name: Rock Tower Pond
description: A pond near the Rock Tower.

details.history: Rock Tower Pond is a location that can be visited and explored in the game.
details.travel: The real-world inspiration is likely based on several ponds in the region.
details.game_connections: It may be part of some side quests.

name: Kuttenberg (Kutná Hora)
description: A major city known for its silver mines, an important economic and cultural center.

details.history: Kuttenberg is a large city in the game, featuring various quests and activities.
details.travel: The real-world counterpart is Kutná Hora in the Czech Republic, a UNESCO World Heritage Site.
details.game_connections: Several quests, including some related to the main storyline, take place in Kuttenberg.

details.history: The Sedletz Monastery is an important religious site.
details.travel: The real-world counterpart is the Sedlec Ossuary in Kutná Hora.
details.game_connections: It may be involved in some quests.

details.history: Suchdol is a location that can be visited and explored in the game.
details.travel: The real-world inspiration is likely based on several villages in the region.
details.game_connections: It may be part of some side quests.

details.travel: The real-world inspiration is likely based on several rock formations in the region.
details.game_connections: It may be part of some side quests.

details.history: The Italian Court is a location that can be visited and explored in the game.
details.travel: The real-world counterpart is the Italian Court (Vlašský dvůr) in Kutná Hora.
details.game_connections: It may be part of some side quests.

details.history: Saint Barbara's Church is a location that can be visited and explored in the game.
details.travel: The real-world counterpart is St. Barbara's Church in Kutná Hora.
details.game_connections: It may be part of some side quests.
